fields.name: alternativeHeadline
fields.title: Alternative Headline
fields.description: A secondary title of the CreativeWork.

fields.name: author
fields.title: Author
fields.description: The author of this content.

fields.name: citation
fields.title: Citation
fields.description: A citation or reference to another creative work, such as another publication, web page, scholarly article, etc. NOTE: Candidate for promotion to ScholarlyArticle.

fields.name: contentLocation
fields.title: Content Location
fields.description: The location of the content.

fields.name: contentRating
fields.title: Content Rating
fields.description: Official rating of a piece of contentâ€”for example,'MPAA PG-13'.

fields.name: contributor
fields.title: Contributor
fields.description: A secondary contributor to the CreativeWork.

fields.name: copyrightHolder
fields.title: Copyright Holder
fields.description: The party holding the legal copyright to the CreativeWork.

fields.name: copyrightYear
fields.title: Copyright Year
fields.description: The year during which the claimed copyright for the CreativeWork was first asserted.

fields.name: datePublished
fields.title: Date Published
fields.description: Date of first broadcast/publication.

fields.name: discussionUrl
fields.title: Discussion Url
fields.description: A link to the page containing the comments of the CreativeWork.

fields.name: editor
fields.title: Editor
fields.description: Specifies the Person who edited the CreativeWork.

fields.name: genre
fields.title: Genre
fields.description: Genre of the creative work

fields.name: headline
fields.title: Headline
fields.description: Headline of the article

fields.name: inLanguage
fields.title: In Language
fields.description: The language of the content. please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard.

fields.name: keywords
fields.title: Keywords
fields.description: The keywords/tags used to describe this content.

fields.name: publisher
fields.title: Publisher
fields.description: The publisher of the creative work.

fields.name: sourceOrganization
fields.title: Source Organization
fields.description: The Organization on whose behalf the creator was working.

fields.name: text
fields.title: Text
fields.description: The textual content of this CreativeWork.

fields.name: thumbnailUrl
fields.title: Thumbnail Url
fields.description: A thumbnail image relevant to the Thing.

fields.name: version
fields.title: Version
fields.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified resource.
